paper_abstract: In this paper strengthened versions of the Minkowski, Chebyshev, Jensen and Holder inequalities for Sugeno integral and T-(S-)evaluators are given. As an application, some equivalent forms and some particular results have been established. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On some advanced type inequalities for Sugeno integral and T-(S-)evaluators
